idea: Creating an online platform where people can put up ads for what they want to buy or sell. Additionally they can also exchange books and video games through our website. In future we plan to come up with well defined mechanism for donating and renting stuff as well.
name: SS Online Classifieds LLP

idea:
This SaaS based software will provide the doctor with the digital prescription where doctor can give the prescription online/offline and can take the print out of the given prescription as well as the doctor can store the whole prescription history of the patient and can review it wherever and whenever it is needed through any device this SaaS Based software is also has features as follows :


1. Doctor's can view whole prescription history and case history of the patient.

2. Doctor's can take back up of all the patient data in USB or hard drive if he requires in ( .PDF / .docx ) format.

3. Doctor's from various fields get the prescription format they prefer.

4. Various types of prescription format to choose from.

5. All medicines names are be available for prescribing to a patient.

6. Doctor's get to view the whole medical / prescription history of patient.

7. Printing feature for printing the prescription.

8. Followup patient's information on doctor's dashboard.

9. Patient's will get notifications or messages when it is time for him/her to take medicines.

10. By taking data from the health tracking devices patient's will get notified to visit a doctor prior to they face some health issues.

11. Patient's can take online appointment with the doctor they prefer.

12. Patient's get to view the whole medical history.

13. This SaaS Based Software can be accessed from almost any device ( Excluding the smart watches and other mini devices ).
name: Erezept

idea:
Mihuru is building a financial services platform to empower the Indian millennial to make better financial decisions through goal based spends.

Our journey has started with the millennial traveller persona as travel is a high priority, large expense.

Today, Indian millennials don't have enough saved up to be able to afford expensive flights. By the time they save, airfares would have shot up, leading to more spends.

We enable Indian millennials to travel by spreading the cost over months. They can lock in low airfares months in advance of planned travel without having the cash on-hand to pay the large upfront costs. The travel cost is paid off in instalments before they fly, even saving upto 40% on airfare. This enables these millennials to take their first international trip or avoid the hassles of traveling by train, without taking on any burden of expensive debt.
name: ITRAVELEO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Cashflo is a private exchange for working capital connecting corporates, vendors and financiers on a common platform to help them collaborate for small business financing
name: VALOR INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Firmway digitises the entire third party confirmation process making it stress-free for the business entities, confirmers and auditors. It sends confirmations, tracks responses, automates reminders and provides advanced reporting. The portal not only helps you to facilitate these confirmations but also provides a platform to reconcile them. It transforms the slow and manual process of confirmations into a secure, streamlined and transparent process.
name: Firmway Services Private Limited
